TopicTitle: What is your criteria for colonization of celestial bodies in stock KSP?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

For all those players who like to play stock, what are your criteria (or goals) for determining that a particular celestial body is colonized?

Have a base in every biome , have a bunch of relays(so much that one crashes into your space station). Can land and takeoff whenever you want, have at least ten mobile bases.Oh and a bunch of space stations as well.
Scenery. I make my bases where there's a good view.

7 hours ago, Selective Genius said:

Hello,

For all those players who like to play stock, what are your criteria (or goals) for determining that a particular celestial body is colonized?

When the engine on the lander gets busted upon landing.

Edited June 26, 2020 by RoninFrog
